tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AR_Performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ar_content_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    performance_data JSON,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE AR_Content (
    ar_content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    url VARCHAR(255),
    content_type VARCHAR(50),
    creation_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE content_engagement (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ar_content_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    engagement_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (ar_content_id) REFERENCES augmented_reality_content(id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_feedback (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    ar_content_id INT,
    feedback TEXT,
    rating INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES content_engagement(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (ar_content_id) REFERENCES augmented_reality_content(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ar_content_tracking (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ar_content_id INT,
    viewer_id INT,
    time_of_interaction TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (ar_content_id) REFERENCES augmented_reality_content(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (viewer_id) REFERENCES content_engagement(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Content_Details (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    creator_id INT,
    upload_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE User_Interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
